__e: Please, I already told you, I'm not listening to some stupid goddamn deathbed speech, okay?
So I won't listen to protestations of high standards of journalism... when you're on the streets, soliciting audiences like the rest of us.
It's gonna be hard to find someone else to listen to your winning speeches.
QUIT MAKING SPEECHES AND TELL ME WHAT'S ON YOUR MIND.
Me. I throw the ball, I give the speeches, and I decide if you and I are gonna talk about what happened the other night, not you.
